segments.text: I see the little girl standing there, so excited about getting a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s reaching up with her hand open, like she’s begging for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t seem to notice how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really struggling to get those cookies, but she’s just waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever fallen trying to do something like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and she’s not even flinching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She must really trust her brother, or she’s just not thinking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get caught, but I also hope they don’t get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a sweet but reckless moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
